summary: This document is an email from Jes Staley to Jeffrey Epstein, indicating that Staley has attempted to contact Epstein multiple times and is currently in New York City. The email is marked as confidential and is related to JPMorgan Chase.

persons.name: Jes Staley

keyFacts: Jes Staley sent an email to Jeffrey Epstein on November 25, 2012.
Staley mentioned he had tried to contact Epstein multiple times.
The email indicates Staley is currently in New York City.
The document is marked as confidential and relates to JPMorgan Chase.
